tool.name: pRESTO AlignSets
tool.description: Multiple-align sequences with the same barcodes.
tool.command: ln -s '$fastq_in' in.fastq && AlignSets.py muscle --nproc "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1}" -s in.fastq --bf '$bf' $div --outname=tmp #if $capture_log --log '$log_out' #end if

param.name: fastq_in
param.label: Input FASTQ file
param.help: FASTQ file of sequences with barcodes/UMIs in an annotation.

param.label: Barcode Field
param.help: Name of the annotation field which contains the barcode/UMI sequence.

param.label: Calculate Nucleotide Diversity
param.help: Specify to calculate nucleotide diversity of each set.

tool.help:
Multiple aligns sequences with the same barcode to correct for any misalignments due to either different primer usage or insertions/deletions in the sequences.
Only supports the "muscle" sub-command of pRESTO's AlignSets.py.
See the `pRESTO online help <@PRESTO_BASE_URL@/en/stable>`_ for more information.
@HELP_NOTE@
